languages.text: При получении K ранений персонаж снимает с себя все ранения и получает {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}. Первые M {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g} (или M×6 cекунд во внебоевой обстановке) ранение называется свежим. После истечения срока оно превращается в {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}старое ранение{/g}. Разные типы ранений лечатся по-разному. Параметры N, K, M изменяются относительно выбранной сложности игры. Для сложности "Бесстрашная" эти значения находятся в районе 50%/3/3. Персонаж избавляется от травм следующим образом: -Отдыхом на корабле / в специально отведенных на зонах местах. На корабле травмы излечиваются как только персонаж заходит на мостик. Отдельных действий (таких как сон в кровати, разговор с медиками, проматывание времени и т.п.) не требуется. В случае, если персонажу недоступен возврат на корабль, на локации находятся точки для отдыха и/или восстановления (например, медикае-станция, дружественный NPC-лекарь или просто безопасное место, где можно отдохнуть). Взаимодействие может выполняться как через диалог, так и просто кнопкой "исцелить травмы". -Редкими и дорогими расходными предметами. Персонаж избавляется от ранений следующим образом: -Отдыхом на корабле / в специально отведенных на зонах местах. -Редкими и дорогими расходными предметами. -Применение медкомплекта автоматически снимает одно свежее ранение. Если свежих ранений нет, персонаж выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g} со сложностью 0. В случае успеха медкомплект снимает одно старое ранение.

Upon receiving K {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, all injuries are removed from the character and they suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} instead. For the first M {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (or (M × 6) seconds out of combat), an injury is considered fresh. Once this period of time passes, the fresh injury turns into an old injury. Different types of injuries can be healed by different means. The variables N, K, and M change depending on the game difficulty. On Daring difficulty, these variables are equal to 50/3/3, respectively. Traumas can be removed by: -Resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest. Traumas are healed the moment the character enters the bridge. No specific actions (such as sleeping, speaking to chirurgeons, or waiting for time to pass) are required. Your party may find itself unable to return to the ship, but the area you are in could have some means of resting or recovering such as a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g} station, a healer, or simply a place suitable for respite. In this scenario, you can heal your characters via an interaction of some sort, such as a dialogue or a button. -Using rare and expensive consumable items. Injuries can be removed by: -Resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest. -Using rare and expensive consumable items. -Using a medikit automatically removes one fresh injury. If there are no fresh injuries on the target, the character administering the treatment makes a Medicae skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (difficulty 0). If they succeed, they remove one old injury.

traits.locale_text: Upon receiving K injuries, all injuries are removed from the character and they suffer a trauma instead. For the first M rounds (or M×6 seconds out of combat), an injury is considered fresh. Once this period of time passes, the fresh injury turns into an old injury. Different types of injuries can be healed by different means. The variables N, K, and M change depending on the game difficulty. On Core difficulty, these variables are equal to 50/3/3, respectively. Traumas can be removed by: - Resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest. Traumas are healed the moment the character enters the bridge. No specific actions (such as sleeping, speaking to chirurgeons, or waiting for time to pass) are required. If your party finds itself unable to return to the ship, the area you are in will have some means of resting or recovering such as a medicae station, a healer, or simply a place suitable for respite. In this scenario, you can heal your characters via an interaction of some sort, such as a dialogue or a button. - Using rare and expensive consumable items. Injuries can be removed by: - Resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest. - Using rare and expensive consumable items. - Using a medikit automatically removes one fresh injury. If there are no fresh injuries on the target, the character administering the healing makes a Medicae skill test (difficulty 0). If they succeed, they remove one old injury.

languages.text: Bei Erhalt von K {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} werden alle Verletzungen vom Charakter entfernt und er erleidet stattdessen ein {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}. Für die ersten M {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} (oder (M × 6) Sekunden außerhalb des Kampfes), wird eine Verletzung als frisch eingestuft. Sobald diese Zeit verstrichen ist, wird die frische Verletzung zu einer alten Verletzung. Verschiedene Arten von Verletzungen können durch verschiedene Mittel geheilt werden. Die Variablen N, K und M verändern sich abhängig vom Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels. Beim Waghalsig-Schwierigkeitsgrad entsprechen diese Variablen jeweils 50/3/3. Traumata können wie folgt entfernt werden: -Durch Ausruhen auf dem Schiff oder an bestimmten anderen zum Ausruhen geeigneten Orten. Traumata werden sofort geheilt, wenn ein Charakter die Brücke betritt. Es sind keine spezifischen Aktionen erforderlich (wie z. B. schlafen, mit einem Chirurgeum sprechen oder Zeit verstreichen lassen). Deiner Gruppe ist es eventuell nicht möglich, zum Schiff zurückzukehren, aber der Bereich, in dem sie sich befindet, könnte Mittel zum Ausruhen oder Erholen bieten, wie z. B. eine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Station, einen Heiler oder einfach einen Ort, der sich für eine Ruhepause eignet. In diesem Szenario kannst du deine Charaktere mit einer möglichen Interaktion heilen, wie z. B. einem Dialog oder einem Knopf. -Durch Verwenden seltener und teurer Verbrauchsgegenstände. Verletzungen können wie folgt entfernt werden: -Durch Ausruhen auf dem Schiff oder an bestimmten anderen zum Ausruhen geeigneten Orten. -Durch Verwenden seltener und teurer Verbrauchsgegenstände. -Das Verwenden eines Medikits entfernt automatisch eine frische Verletzung. Hat das Ziel keine frischen Verletzungen, durchläuft der Charakter, der die Behandlung durchführt, eine Medicae-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Fertigkeitsprobe{/g} (Schwierigkeit 0). Bei Bestehen wird eine alte Verletzung entfernt.

languages.text: Après avoir subi K {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g}, toutes les lésions du personnage sont supprimées et celui-ci subit un {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g}. Durant les M premiers {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (ou (M × 6) secondes hors combat), une lésion est considérée comme récente. Une fois ce laps de temps écoulé, une lésion récente devient une lésion ancienne. Différents moyens permettent de soigner diverses lésions. Les variables N, K et M évoluent en fonction du niveau de difficulté du jeu. Au niveau de difficulté Téméraire, ces variables correspondent respectivement à 50/3/3. Les traumatismes peuvent disparaître comme suit : -En se reposant à bord du vaisseau ou dans certains autres endroits propices au repos. Les traumatismes guérissent dès que le personnage accède à la passerelle. Aucune action spécifique (par exemple, dormir, parler aux chirurgeons, attendre que le temps passe) n'est requise. Votre groupe n'est pas toujours en mesure de regagner le vaisseau, mais la zone dans laquelle vous vous trouvez peut offrir un moyen de vous reposer ou de récupérer, comme une station de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g}, un soigneur ou simplement un endroit propice au repos. Dans ce cas, vous pouvez soigner vos personnages par le biais d'une interaction, comme un dialogue ou un bouton. -En utilisant des objets consommables aussi rares que coûteux. Les lésions peuvent disparaître comme suit : -En se reposant à bord du vaisseau ou dans certains autres endroits propices au repos. -En utilisant des objets consommables aussi rares que coûteux. -En utilisant un médikit qui permet de faire automatiquement disparaître une lésion récente. En l'absence de lésion récente sur la cible, le personnage qui administre le traitement passe un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence de Medicae (difficulté 0). S'il le réussit, une lésion ancienne disparaît.

Les traumatismes peuvent disparaître comme suit : -En se reposant à bord du vaisseau ou dans certains autres endroits propices au repos. Les traumatismes guérissent dès que le personnage accède à la passerelle. Aucune action spécifique (par exemple, dormir, parler aux chirurgeons, attendre que le temps passe) n'est requise. Votre groupe n'est pas toujours en mesure de regagner le vaisseau, mais la zone dans laquelle vous vous trouvez peut offrir un moyen de se reposer ou de récupérer, comme une station {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g}, un soigneur ou simplement un endroit propice au repos. Dans ce cas, vous pouvez soigner vos personnages par le biais d'une interaction, comme un dialogue ou un bouton. -En utilisant des objets consommables aussi rares que coûteux. Les lésions peuvent disparaître comme suit : -En se reposant à bord du vaisseau ou dans certains autres endroits propices au repos. -En utilisant des objets consommables aussi rares que coûteux. -En utilisant un médikit qui permet de faire automatiquement disparaître une lésion récente. En l'absence de lésion récente sur la cible, le personnage qui administre le traitement passe un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence Medicae (difficulté 0). S'il le réussit, une lésion ancienne disparaît.

languages.text: 当角色获得B层{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}时，所有的伤势效果都会被移除，改为获得{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}效果。 当受到伤势的接下来C{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中（或战斗之外的（C×6）秒中），该伤势都被视为新伤。一旦这段期间结束之后，新伤就会变成旧伤。 不同类型的伤势可以通过不同的方法治愈。 A、B和C这三个变量会根据游戏难度而变化。在冒险难度中，这三个变量分别等于50%最大生命值，3层，3轮。 您可以通过以下方式移除创伤： - 在虚空舰或其他适合休息的地方休息。当角色进入舰桥的那一刻，创伤就会得到治愈。您不需要执行特定动作（如睡觉，与外科医生交谈，或等待时间经过）。 有的时候，您的队伍无法回到船上，但您所在的区域可能会有其他适合休息或恢复的手段，如医疗站、医师，或是某个适合休息的地方。{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}{/g}在这种情况下，您可以通过某种形式的互动（如对话或休息）来治愈角色。 - 使用昂贵、稀有的消耗物品。 您可以通过以下方式移除伤势： - 在虚空舰或其他适合休息的地方休息。 - 使用昂贵、稀有的消耗物品。 - 使用医疗包会自动移除一处新伤。如果目标身上只有旧伤，则进行治疗的角色会进行医疗技能{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}（难度为0）。如果检定成功，则可以为目标移除一处旧伤。
languages.original_text: Upon receiving K {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, all injuries are removed from the character and they suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} instead. For the first M {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (or (M × 6) seconds out of combat), an injury is considered fresh. Once this period of time passes, the fresh injury turns into an old injury. Different types of injuries can be healed by different means. The variables N, K, and M change depending on the game difficulty. On Daring difficulty, these variables are equal to 50/3/3, respectively. Traumas can be removed by: -Resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest. Traumas are healed the moment the character enters the bridge. No specific actions (such as sleeping, speaking to chirurgeons, or waiting for time to pass) are required. Your party may find itself unable to return to the ship, but the area you are in could have some means of resting or recovering such as a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g} station, a healer, or simply a place suitable for respite. In this scenario, you can heal your characters via an interaction of some sort, such as a dialogue or a button. -Using rare and expensive consumable items. Injuries can be removed by: -Resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest. -Using rare and expensive consumable items. -Using a medikit automatically removes one fresh injury. If there are no fresh injuries on the target, the character administering the treatment makes a Medicae skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (difficulty 0). If they succeed, they remove one old injury.

languages.text: Al recibir K {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}, el personaje queda desprendido de todas sus lesiones y, en su lugar, sufre {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}. Una lesión se considera reciente durante los primeros M {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} (o (M × 6) segundos sin combatir). Una vez concluido dicho periodo de tiempo, la lesión reciente pasa a ser una lesión vieja. Cada tipo de lesión puede tratarse de distintas maneras. Las variables N, K y M cambian en función de la dificultad del juego. En dificultad Audaz, estas variables equivalen respectivamente a 50/3/3. Las aflicciones pueden eliminarse de las siguientes maneras: -Descansando en la nave o en ciertos lugares designados para ello. Las aflicciones se curan en cuanto el personaje entra en el puente. No se necesita realizar ninguna acción concreta (como dormir, hablar con cirujanos o esperar a que pase el tiempo). Puede darse la situación en que tu grupo no pueda regresar a la nave, pero también que la zona en la que te encuentres incluya algún modo de descansar o recuperarse, como una estación {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g}, un médico o simplemente un lugar donde recuperar el aliento. En esta tesitura, puedes curar a tus personajes por medio de alguna interacción, véase un diálogo o un botón. -Usando objetos consumibles poco comunes y cotizados. Las lesiones pueden eliminarse de las siguientes maneras: -Descansando en la nave o en ciertos lugares designados para ello. -Usando objetos consumibles poco comunes y cotizados. -Usando un botiquín. Estos eliminan automáticamente una lesión reciente. Si el objetivo no presenta lesiones recientes, el personaje que administre el tratamiento debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de habilidad Medicae (dificultad 0). En caso de resultar exitosa, se eliminará una lesión vieja.

languages.original_text: When a character takes K wounds, the character is removed from all wounds and is injured. For the first M rounds (or M×6 seconds in non-combat situations), the wound is called a fresh wound. After the time limit expires, it becomes an old wound. Different types of wounds are treated differently. The parameters N, K, M change relative to the selected game difficulty. For the "Harsh" difficulty, these values are around 50%/3/3. The character gets rid of injuries as follows: - By resting on the ship / in designated areas on the zones. - On the ship, injuries are healed as soon as the character enters the bridge. No separate actions (such as sleeping in bed, talking to medics, passing time, etc.) are required. - In the event that the character is unable to return to the ship, there are rest and/or recovery points at the location (such as a medi-station, a friendly NPC healer, or simply a safe place to rest). Interaction can be done either through dialogue or simply by pressing the "heal injuries" button. - Rare and expensive consumable items. The character gets rid of injuries as follows: - By resting on the ship / in designated areas on zones. - Rare and expensive consumable items. - Using a medkit automatically removes one fresh wound. If there are no fresh wounds, the character makes a Medicine skill check with difficulty 0. If successful, the medkomplekt removes one old wound.

languages.text: Kの{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を受けると、すべての負傷がキャラから取り除かれ、代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を食らう。最初のM{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（または（M ｘ 6）秒間、戦闘から離れた場合）は、新たな負傷とみなされる。この期間が終了すると、新たな負傷が古傷と化する。負傷のタイプによって治癒の方法も異なる。変数N、K、は、ゲームの難易度に応じて変化する。難易度「フィアレス」では、これらの変数はそれぞれ50/3/3に等しくなる。 外傷は以下の方法で取り除ける。 -外傷は、船で休息を取る、あるいはその他の休息に適した場所で休息を取ることで回復する。外傷はキャラクターがブリッジに差し掛かると回復する。特定のアクション（睡眠、チラージョンに話し掛ける、時間経過の回復を待つ等）が要求されるわけではない。 -あなたの部隊は船に戻ることができないかもしれないが、あなたのいるエリアには、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}ステーションやヒーラー、または単に休息に適した場所など、休息または回復するための施設が存在している可能性がある。本シナリオでは、会話やボタンを押す等の行動でキャラクターを回復できる。 -レアで高価な消耗品を使用する。 負傷は以下の方法で取り除ける。 -船で休息を取る、あるいはその他の休息に適した場所で休息を取る。 -レアで高価な性もを使用する。 -メディキットを使用すると、新たな傷が1つ自動的に取り除かれる。もし、ターゲットに新たな傷がない場合は、治療を施すキャラクターはメディケアスキル{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}（難易度 0）を行う。成功すると、古傷が取り除かれる。

languages.text: Karakter K {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g} aldığında, üzerindeki tüm sakatlıklar kaldırılır ve yerlerini bir {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g} alır. İlk M {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} (veya çatışmadan çıkıldıktan sonra ilk (M × 6) saniye), bir sakatlık taze kabul edilir. Bu süre sona erdiğinde ise taze sakatlık, eski sakatlığa dönüşür. Farklı türdeki sakatlıklar farklı yöntemlerle iyileştirilebilir. N, K ve M değişkenleri oyunun zorluğuna bağlı olarak değişir. Bu değişkenler, Yürekli zorluk seviyesinde sırasıyla 50/3/3 değerlerine eşittir. Travmalar şu şekillerde giderilebilir: -Gemide veya istirahate müsait benzer yerlerde dinlenerek. Karakter, köprüye adım atar atmaz travmaları da iyileşir. Özel bir eylem yapması (uyumak, cerrahlarla konuşmak veya belirli bir sürenin geçmesini beklemek gibi) gerekmez. Bazen grubunun gemiye dönmesi mümkün olmayabilir ancak bulunduğun bölgede dinlenmek, toparlanmak veya sadece soluklanmak için {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}sıhhiye{/g} istasyonu, şifacı gibi çeşitli imkânlar bulunabilir. Böyle bir durumda, diyaloğa girmek veya düğmeye basmak gibi farklı etkileşim tipleriyle karakterlerini iyileştirebilirsin. -Nadir ve pahalı sarf eşyalar kullanmak. languages.original_text: Upon receiving K {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, all injuries are removed from the character and they suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} instead. For the first M {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (or (M × 6) seconds out of combat), an injury is considered fresh. Once this period of time passes, the fresh injury turns into an old injury. Different types of injuries can be healed by different means. The variables N, K, and M change depending on the game difficulty. On Daring difficulty, these variables are equal to 50/3/3, respectively. Traumas can be removed by: -Resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest. Traumas are healed the moment the character enters the bridge. No specific actions (such as sleeping, speaking to chirurgeons, or waiting for time to pass) are required. Your party may find itself unable to return to the ship, but the area you are in could have some means of resting or recovering such as a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g} station, a healer, or simply a place suitable for respite. In this scenario, you can heal your characters via an interaction of some sort, such as a dialogue or a button. -Using rare and expensive consumable items. Injuries can be removed by: -Resting on the ship or in certain other places suitable for rest. -Using rare and expensive consumable items. -Using a medikit automatically removes one fresh injury. If there are no fresh injuries on the target, the character administering the treatment makes a Medicae skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (difficulty 0). If they succeed, they remove one old injury.
